com.solidfire.core.client

Class HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSSLVerification

  • Object
    • HttpsRequestDispatcher
      • HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSSLVerification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestDispatcher, Versionable

    public class HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSSLVerification
extends HttpsRequestDispatcher
    A request dispatcher that completely disables SSL hostname and certificate verification.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class HttpsRequestDispatcher

        DEFAULT_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT, DEFAULT_READ_TIMEOUT

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSSLVerification(URL endpoint)
      Create a dispatcher using no authentication.
      HttpsRequestDispatcherWithoutSSLVerification(URL endpoint, String username, String password)
      Create a dispatcher using HTTP basic authentication using the supplied username and password.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void prepareConnection(HttpsURLConnection connection)
      Constructs a HTTPS POST connection, with no SSL hostname verification or certificate lookup.

      • Methods inherited from class HttpsRequestDispatcher

        decodeResponse, dispatchRequest, getEndpoint, getPort, getVersion, setConnectionTimeout, setReadTimeout, setTimeoutToDefault

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        Create a dispatcher using HTTP basic authentication using the supplied username and password.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the hostname or IP address of the connection
        username - username credential
        password - password credential
